memories.name: Test Automation Learning
memories.episode_body: Enjoying working on Playwright E2E tests. Want to learn more about performance testing and load testing. Kate is supportive mentor.

memories.name: Luis Rodriguez - Associate QA Engineer
memories.episode_body: Luis Rodriguez is Associate QA Engineer on QA Team at TechFlow Solutions, reporting to Kate Thompson. Specializes in automated testing, bug tracking, and test case design. 2 years QA experience.

memories.name: E2E Test Automation with Playwright
memories.episode_body: Writing E2E tests using Playwright framework. Tests cover: user login, checkout flow, payment processing, order confirmation. Tests run in CI pipeline and locally. Using page object model pattern for maintainable tests. Configured to run in headless mode with video recording on failure.

memories.name: Bug Tracking Process
memories.episode_body: Using Jira for bug tracking. Bug template includes: steps to reproduce, expected vs actual behavior, severity (critical/high/medium/low), environment details, screenshots. Bugs triaged daily with engineering team. High/critical bugs addressed immediately.
